meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels clearly show 02271.8, which is 2271.8 m³. The red dial pointer is positioned exactly halfway between the 0.02 and 0.03 marks (representing 0.025 m³). Following the rule to interpolate to 0.01 resolution, and in cases of exact halfway ambiguity, a conservative reading of 0.02 m³ was chosen for the dial_value. The needle_angle_degrees reflects the true physical position of the needle at 0.025 (90 degrees clockwise from 0.00).
